questions.question: Which of the following is NOT an HTML5 semantic element?

choices: To make the code look more complex
To make the website load faster

questions.question: Which HTML5 input type allows users to select a color?
What does the 'required' attribute do in an HTML form?
choices: Ensures that a form field is filled out before submitting
